dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Prefers moderate to fast flowing waters of the lower and middle river valleys.  Feeds on macro-invertebrates and small fishes.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Central America:  Atlantic slope, from southern Mexico to Guatemala and Belize.
